tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PestInfestations (
  pest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pest_name VARCHAR(50),
  crop_affected VARCHAR(50),
  infestation_level INT,
  infestation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
	c_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	c_name STRING,
	c_type STRING,
	affected_by_p_id UUID,
	FOREIGN KEY (affected_by_p_id) REFERENCES Pests(p_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PestInfestation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_name VARCHAR(50),
    infestation_date DATE,
    impact_on_crops VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE Crop (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Farmer (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_plant_date DATE NOT NULL,
    crop_harvest_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PestInfestation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    infestation_date DATE,
    crop_affected VARCHAR(50),
    infestation_severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Crop (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    planted_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InfestationImpact (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    infestation_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InfestationLocation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    infestation_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);
